# Global Coding & Architecture Rules

## Clean Code Rules
- Use meaningful names (camelCase for variables, PascalCase for classes).
- Keep functions short and single-purpose.
- Avoid deeply nested conditionals.

## Logging
- Use structured logs.
- Every API call must include correlation/trace IDs.

## Documentation
- All public functions must include doc comments.
- Comments must be short, clear, and written in English.

## Commit Message Format
Follow Conventional Commits:
- feat:  
- fix:  
- refactor:  
- docs:
